title: Just Call Me Tony
description: This is an illustrated children's book. It is the story of Tony, a purple dragon, who sets off on a journey of discovery. He stops at Natch, a town known for growing the world's best chilies and makes friends with the children of the town. When the town's roaster breaks, Tony saves the day by roasting the chilies in the field by blowing fire. The book's best feature is the ink paintings which can be enjoyed by all ages. The story is aimed at children in the primary grades.
author: June Elliott
